task.title: Input the scores for individual categories

context.p: Enter scores for each criterion associated with the paper type. All the criteria for scoring will be appeared once Paper Type is selected.

step.cmd: Navigate to Properties panel on the left pane and section Score.

title.i: Enter scores for each paper type

step.cmd: Follow the rules for assigning scores:

substep.cmd: Scores range from 1 to 5, 5 being the highest.
Only the associated criteria matched in Step3: Identify Feedback Criteria based on the rubric used should be given scores.
For example, if the Paper Type is YYYYYY, the Expert should only provide scores for the AAAA, BBBB and CCCC.

note.p: Always make sure to input the scores and then click on save to make sure all scores are saved and do recheck this step before moving on as Zoho might glitch sometimes.
